newsitem.title: UK: U-FREIGHT names BIAL as Bangladesh agent.
newsitem.headline: U-FREIGHT names BIAL as Bangladesh agent.

text.p: International freight forwarder, U-Freight said Bengal International Agencies Ltd (BIAL) has been appointed its agent in Bangladesh.

BIAL will have access to U-Freight's global network and will sell the entire range of U-Freight services including air and seafreight, warehousing and distribution services throughout Bangladesh, the company added in a statement.

U-Freight's America president, Gene Bayer said:"Many of our customers now do considerable business with Western Asia and U-Freight recognises the Indian subcontinent's tremendous development potential hence this appointment. We expect the region to emerge as a major manufacturing zone within the next few years in much the same way as China and South East Asia"
A U-Freight spokesman said textiles and toys are expected to be the key products shipped from Bangladesh. - Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
